mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TUM_COLLECTION_PROJECT WHERE COL_ID=#{col_id}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNO,PJ_ID, PJ_TITLE, NAME, REMAINING_DAYS, PJ_SIMG, FUNDING,STATUS,PROGRESS, PJ_ADDR FROM (SELECT PJ_ID, PJ_TITLE, NAME, REMAINING_DAYS, PJ_SIMG, TO_CHAR(FUNDING, '999,999,999,999') FUNDING, (CASE WHEN REMAINING_DAYS < 0 AND FUNDING >= PJ_PRICE THEN '펀딩 성공' WHEN REMAINING_DAYS < 0 AND FUNDING < PJ_PRICE THEN '펀딩 무산' ELSE '진행중' END) AS STATUS, TRUNC((FUNDING / PJ_PRICE) * 100) AS PROGRESS, PJ_ADDR FROM (SELECT CP.PJ_ID, PJ_TITLE, M.NAME, TRUNC(PJ_END_DATE-SYSDATE+1) REMAINING_DAYS, NVL(SUM(TOTAL_FUNDING_PRICE), 0) FUNDING, PJ_SIMG, PJ_PRICE,COL_PJ_REGDATE, PJ_ADDR FROM TUM_PROJECT P, TUM_MEMBER M, TUM_FUNDING F, TUM_COLLECTION_PROJECT CP WHERE P.EMAIL = M.EMAIL AND P.PJ_ID = F.PJ_ID(+) AND PJ_CHECK_YN = 'y' AND COL_ID=#{col_id} AND CP.PJ_ID = P.PJ_ID GROUP BY CP.PJ_ID, PJ_TITLE, M.NAME,TRUNC(PJ_END_DATE-SYSDATE+1), PJ_SIMG, PJ_PRICE ,pj_start_date,COL_PJ_REGDATE, PJ_ADDR) ORDER BY CASE WHEN STATUS IN ('진행중') THEN 0 WHEN STATUS IN ('펀딩 성공') THEN 1 ELSE 2 END ASC, COL_PJ_REGDATE)) WHERE RNO BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT PJ_ID, PJ_TITLE, NAME, REMAINING_DAYS, PJ_SIMG, FUNDING,STATUS,PROGRESS, PJ_ADDR FROM (SELECT PJ_ID, PJ_TITLE, NAME, REMAINING_DAYS, PJ_SIMG, TO_CHAR(FUNDING, '999,999,999,999') FUNDING, (CASE WHEN REMAINING_DAYS < 0 AND FUNDING >= PJ_PRICE THEN '펀딩 성공' WHEN REMAINING_DAYS < 0 AND FUNDING < PJ_PRICE THEN '펀딩 무산' ELSE '진행중' END) AS STATUS, TRUNC((FUNDING / PJ_PRICE) * 100) AS PROGRESS, PJ_ADDR FROM (SELECT P.PJ_ID, PJ_TITLE, M.NAME, TRUNC(PJ_END_DATE -SYSDATE+1) REMAINING_DAYS, NVL(SUM(TOTAL_FUNDING_PRICE), 0) FUNDING, PJ_SIMG, PJ_PRICE, PJ_ADDR FROM TUM_PROJECT P, TUM_MEMBER M, TUM_FUNDING F WHERE P.EMAIL = M.EMAIL AND P.PJ_ID = F.PJ_ID(+) AND PJ_CHECK_YN = 'y' AND SYSDATE >= PJ_START_DATE
AND PJ_CATEGORY=#{category}
AND EDITOR_RECOMMEND='1'
AND (PJ_TITLE Like '%'|| #{search} ||'%' OR NAME LIKE '%'|| #{search} ||'%' OR PJ_CATEGORY LIKE '%'|| #{search} ||'%' OR PJ_TAG LIKE '%'|| #{search} ||'%')
GROUP BY P.PJ_ID, PJ_TITLE, M.NAME,TRUNC(PJ_END_DATE-SYSDATE+1), PJ_SIMG, PJ_PRICE, PJ_ADDR))
STATUS = '진행중'
STATUS = '펀딩 성공'
AND PROGRESS <= 75
AND PROGRESS BETWEEN 75 AND 99
AND PROGRESS >= 100
AND FUNDING <= TO_CHAR(1000000, '999,999,999,999')
AND FUNDING BETWEEN TO_CHAR(1000000, '999,999,999,999') AND TO_CHAR(10000000, '999,999,999,999')
AND FUNDING BETWEEN TO_CHAR(10000000, '999,999,999,999') AND TO_CHAR(50000000, '999,999,999,999')
AND FUNDING BETWEEN TO_CHAR(50000000, '999,999,999,999') AND TO_CHAR(100000000, '999,999,999,999')
AND FUNDING >= TO_CHAR(100000000, '999,999,999,999')
)

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNO, PJ_ID, PJ_TITLE, NAME, REMAINING_DAYS, PJ_SIMG, FUNDING,STATUS,PROGRESS, PJ_ADDR FROM (SELECT PJ_ID, PJ_TITLE, NAME, REMAINING_DAYS, PJ_SIMG, TO_CHAR(FUNDING, '999,999,999,999') FUNDING, (CASE WHEN REMAINING_DAYS < 0 AND FUNDING >= PJ_PRICE THEN '펀딩 성공' WHEN REMAINING_DAYS < 0 AND FUNDING < PJ_PRICE THEN '펀딩 무산' ELSE '진행중' END) AS STATUS, TRUNC((FUNDING / PJ_PRICE) * 100) AS PROGRESS, PJ_ADDR FROM (SELECT P.PJ_ID, PJ_TITLE, M.NAME, TRUNC(PJ_END_DATE-SYSDATE+1) REMAINING_DAYS, NVL(SUM(TOTAL_FUNDING_PRICE), 0) FUNDING, PJ_SIMG, PJ_PRICE, PJ_START_DATE, PJ_HITS, PJ_ADDR FROM TUM_PROJECT P, TUM_MEMBER M, TUM_FUNDING F WHERE P.EMAIL = M.EMAIL AND P.PJ_ID = F.PJ_ID(+) AND PJ_CHECK_YN = 'y' AND SYSDATE >= PJ_START_DATE
AND PJ_CATEGORY=#{category}
AND EDITOR_RECOMMEND='1'
AND (PJ_TITLE Like '%'|| #{search} ||'%' OR NAME LIKE '%'|| #{search} ||'%' OR PJ_CATEGORY LIKE '%'|| #{search} ||'%' OR PJ_TAG LIKE '%'|| #{search} ||'%')
GROUP BY P.PJ_ID, PJ_TITLE, M.NAME,TRUNC(PJ_END_DATE-SYSDATE+1), PJ_SIMG, PJ_PRICE, PJ_START_DATE, PJ_HITS, PJ_ADDR )
CASE WHEN STATUS IN ('진행중') THEN 0 WHEN STATUS IN ('펀딩 성공') THEN 1 ELSE 2 END ASC, PJ_HITS DESC CASE WHEN STATUS IN ('진행중') THEN 0 WHEN STATUS IN ('펀딩 성공') THEN 1 ELSE 2 END ASC, PJ_START_DATE DESC PROGRESS DESC FUNDING DESC CASE WHEN STATUS IN ('진행중') THEN 0 WHEN STATUS IN ('펀딩 성공') THEN 1 ELSE 2 END ASC, REMAINING_DAYS ASC
)
STATUS = '진행중'
STATUS = '펀딩 성공'
AND PROGRESS <= 75
AND PROGRESS BETWEEN 75 AND 99
AND PROGRESS >= 100
AND FUNDING <= TO_CHAR(1000000, '999,999,999,999')
AND FUNDING BETWEEN TO_CHAR(1000000, '999,999,999,999') AND TO_CHAR(10000000, '999,999,999,999')
AND FUNDING BETWEEN TO_CHAR(10000000, '999,999,999,999') AND TO_CHAR(50000000, '999,999,999,999')
AND FUNDING BETWEEN TO_CHAR(50000000, '999,999,999,999') AND TO_CHAR(100000000, '999,999,999,999')
AND FUNDING >= TO_CHAR(100000000, '999,999,999,999')
) WHERE RNO BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
